oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U.S. cow-calf producer interest in and access to technology for cattle health and production record-keeping purposes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jumper, Isaac
Huston, C.L.
Willis, R.W.
Smith, D.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cow-calf
technology use
producer survey
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to describe U.S. cow-calf producer interest in and access to technology for collection and utilization of cattle health and production records (CHPR).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2021 Annual Conference Proceedings; 259
